title: Holland vs Northern Ireland, LIVE - Latest European Championship qualifying scores and updates
text:
Holland and Northern Ireland meet in a pivotal Group C match in Rotterdam as qualifying action for next summer's Euro 2020 competition resumes across Europe.

Michael O'Neill's team currently hold the final automatic qualifying spot in the group but their final three fixtures are a double header with Holland as well as a daunting clash with table toppers Germany.

Elsewhere Wales can ill afford defeat in Slovakia if they still wish to reach the tournament via an automatic place in the group.

Scotland realistically are already hoping for another roll of the dice via the play-offs with anything but a win in Russia meaning they will be out of automatic contention. Follow all the evening's action as it happens with Dan Ripley.
description: Holland and Northern Ireland meet in a pivotal Group C match in Rotterdam as qualifying action for next summer's Euro 2020 resumes with eight 7.45pm games. Follow live drama here.
